content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Boiler at position(-21.5, 28.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position -21.5, 28.0)

### Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Steam Engine at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine (position -11.5, 18.5)

### Pipe Group at position(-14.5, 15.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Multiple pipes forming a group (position -14.5, 15.5)

### Pipe Group at position(-9.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Multiple pipes forming a group (position -9.5, 19.5)

### Electricity Group
Consists of the following entities:
- Small Electric Poles at various positions including (position -7.5, 18.5), (position -5.5, 19.5), and (position -4.5, 21.5)

### Copper Plate Mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace (position 5.0, 5.0)

### Lab at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 0.0, 0.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the connection points for pipes are within the valid range and not obstructed by other entities. Verify the positions of both the boiler and offshore pump before attempting to connect them.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities in the desired position.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
